reviews.review: I think it says something when I can play this game for over 1200 hours but can't even clock 100 in CS:GO, you done fucked up Valve
It's fun, but if you own CS:GO there's not much point to play this one besides the custom community made content.

This game is AWESOME. The amount of mods you can find by simply just browsing through all the servers makes the replaying almost unlimited, of course the original game modes are fun as well, but the best things about this game IMO are Zombie Escape and Death Run!

Not the best looking game but the core of it is so good and it has so many different modes and maps!

You play a dude with a rifle shooting other dudes with rifles. You can't go faster, attempting any maneuver crazier than "jump and press crouch" is liable to get you killed. I'd rate the mods but fuck that, base game is shit.

After my 2818 hours the game is simply boring in it's current state. You would be lucky to find a decent server to play on where it's just not where the players buy "admin" so they can abuse the shit out of their powers, but if you do happend to find a decent server the game can be quite enjoyable. But in terms of good gameplay go do yourself a favor and play CS:GO.

this could possibly be one of the best fps's of all time. Headshots are valuable and that makes it great.
If your looking for a pretty realistic tactical shooter that requires teamwork to succeed, then this is the game for you.

Get this game!!! only thing to say...
An amazing FPS game, which requires alot of strategies and skills. It keeps away alot of those COD kids aswell because one cannot simply go in and kill everyone without dying in a humiliating way.

Counter-Strike: Source is a hilarious point and click adventure game for puzzle lovers. The player takes upon the role of an asthmatic vegetarian wolf studying to become a genie. In the course of his adventures the player will encounter a large cast of famous funny characters and solve sixty different puzzles. Six neuroscientist designed highly replayable brain training exercises will earn the player precious hints to help solve the more difficult puzzles.
I don't always play multiplayer-centric FPS's, but when I do, it's Counter-Strike.

It's just a classic. Can't really say anything to critise it in any way, except some people are just too good at it.

10/10

A MUST have game, If your into FPS games your an idiot if you dont get it.

This game is just superb, a very good remake of the old favourite Counter Strike. Bossest game wiv super graphics, physics and awesome team gameplay. Recoil and spray gives way to accuracy penalties and heavy weapons to speed penalties, it's an awesome game, a must have for avery Steam/Action PC gamer. This game should be part of the 'GAMES YOU GOTTA PLAY!' category!!!

Counter Terrorist VS Terrorist. What more could you ask in a game. Counter Strike:Source brings in the old same gameplay from it's predecessor Counter Strike but with new engine called "SOURCE". CSS brings in the old "Buy System" with no addition same old guns. Great hit detection. CustomMaps, and the same old awesome Radio Voices from 1.6. Beware  CS has not autoaim kids!.

Fun, Hard n Very well known, Is how is describe CSS (Counter Strike: Source). if u r into FPS games i seriously recommend CSS. tha game is based truly on skill no hit markers 4 help jus tha customizable cross-hair. Cause dis game is very well known u get alot of tournements, some jus 4 fun n some 4 prizes. Competitive Gamin on dis game is very hard so.... (>Train UP!!<) .... n i hope i play wid ya 1 day :D

This game still haunts me because how addictive the game is really scare because the consept of this game is so simple but it brought millions of us gamers to our desks for hundreds of hours to play made us become single,lost jobs, friends, even loved ones .......But hey i got  a double no scope headshot!!!!!
In all truth this game is simply addictive because its simple and has a flavor that feels all us FPS'er because its really action packed and compitive today the C.S games will live on forever just because they are simple and very addictive time will spent!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
